title: BAHR Golden Set v1.0: 100% Accurate Arabic Poetry Meter Detection Benchmark
description: The BAHR Golden Set is a comprehensive, gold-standard benchmark dataset for Arabic poetry meter detection, achieving perfect 100% validated accuracy across all 20 Arabic meter variants. This dataset represents the first documented gold-standard for comprehensive Arabic meter detection, covering all 16 classical meters plus 4 common variants. The dataset includes 258 fully diacritized verses with pre-computed prosodic patterns, complete metadata, and reproducible evaluation code. Validated with 95% confidence interval [98.57%, 100.00%].
references: BAHR: Arabic Poetry Meter Detection System. https://github.com/goforwest/BAHR
notes: This dataset achieves perfect 100% accuracy on comprehensive Arabic meter detection, validated through rigorous statistical analysis (Wilson score 95% CI: [98.57%, 100.00%]). Includes pre-computed prosodic patterns for all 258 verses, enabling reproducible evaluation. Dataset covers all classical Arabic meters including the rare المتدارك (al-Mutadārik) meter.
